import React from 'react'; import './Home.scss' import bg from '../../images/bg.svg' import Aux from '../../hoc/Aux'; import Fade from 'react-reveal/Fade'; import bigData from '../../images/big-data.svg' import migration from '../../images/cloud-migrate.svg' import security from '../../images/security.svg' import devops from '../../images/devops.svg' import logo from '../../images/logo.png'; const Home = () => { const isMobile = (window.innerWidth < 900) return( { isMobile ? : null }

One Stop Shop For All Your Cloud Needs.

With modern technology and major events leading to the remote interaction of employees and clients alike, the push to migrate to the cloud are larger than ever before. With security, reliable data flows, and positive customer experience all critical, ScaleHaus is here to jump start your company in all of your cloud and delivery needs.

How will ScaleHaus Transform Your Business?

Cloud Migration

Cloud migration is very important

Security

Security is very cool too

DevOps & Delivery

CI/CD and stuff is a must have

Big Data

Keep the data flowing
) } export default Home;
